alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Lawrence County through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cranberry Lake, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cranberry Lake, Shurtleff, and Wanakena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
